item.epicfightitem.cdmoveset.katana.tool: Sheath the sword after 5 seconds of not attacking, the next attack will be enhanced. The skill will also be enhanced.
item.epicfightitem.epicfight.yamato.tool: A weakened version of Yamato, because the stupid author of this mod is limited in ability, the true power of this sword cannot be fully restored.
pack.corrupt_animation.title: Corrupt Animation
pack.More_Power.title: More_Power ! ! !
skill.cdmoveset.bloodwolf.tooltip: When the wolf howls, it's time to counterattack. Gain the protection of the wolf god by dodging and defeating enemies. When the skill stack reaches 10, you will receive the protection of the wolf god, enhance your own attack, and have a chance to interrupt the enemy's attack.
skill.cdmoveset.cdparryskill: New version technical update, this skill is useless now.
skill.cdmoveset.cdparryskill.tooltip: Specially designed block, which I don't know how to do, don't ask.
skill.cdmoveset.greatsword_dual_skill.to: Powerful ground-shaking attack, knocking down all enemies in the area.
skill.cdmoveset.guardparry.tooltip: Allows you to adjust your defensive posture, and during the skill duration, block all blockable attacks. Gain one layer of defense points for each defeated enemy (the base value of defense points is 6, the Enchantment of Sweeping Blade can increase defense points).
skill.cdmoveset.katanaskill.tooltip: (This is a katana skill prepared for the future.)After briefly raising the blade, unleash a powerful strike. Automatically parry during the blade-raising process, and if the parry is successful, counterattack.
skill.cdmoveset.lethalslicing.tooltip: Stun the enemy and unleash a powerful strike, the number of strikes varies depending on the number of enemies.
skill.cdmoveset.psstep.tooltip: Allows you to dodge with different actions, successful dodges can trigger special effects, and recharge your weapon.
skill.cdmoveset.spearslash.tooltip: Grab surrounding enemies and knock them down powerfully.
skill.cdmoveset.sstep.tooltip:
A meaningless dodging skill book, maybe the author was too lazy and forgot to delete it, it's no different from dodging, just reduces dodging cost by 1 stamina.

(Stamina: %d)
skill.cdmoveset.sword_slash.tooltip: Rotate forward to unleash a powerful strike.
skill.cdmoveset.yamato_step.tooltip:
Teleport in the specified direction. Dodge all dodgeable attacks.

(Stamina: %d)
skill.cdmoveset.yamatoskill: During the preparation phase of the normal skill, being attacked by an enemy can trigger a counterattack. After 1a, 2a, 3a, additional combos can be released. After parrying, you can release Illusory Sword Realm for a counterattack.
skill.cdmoveset.yamatoskill.tooltip: Different attacks result in different combos.
